summary:
Telegram is a popular messaging app used by over 950 million people worldwide. It works on many devices, like phones, computers, and tablets. Users can send messages, share files, and make calls. The app offers special private chats with extra security.

It also has social features, letting users post stories and create groups. Telegram was made by the Durov brothers in 2013 and is now based in Dubai. It's very popular in Europe, Asia, and Africa. To join, you need a smartphone or a special digital token.
title: Telegram (software)
